name: Nadeem Soharab
profile: Born and raised in New York City, NY, I fostered a love for technology and innovation which would guide me throughout my professional career. Jumping right into the software development industry allowed me to become self-motivated and learn from first-hand experience which I now share to others through articles and live-streams.
